description: Stitch agent parses generated UI layouts into structured JSON capturing UI/UX specifics (spacing, typography, colors, component hierarchy) to prevent unwanted characteristic leakage during code reuse
notes: Use case for STUB-078 (agent-reporting-prompts). Schema focuses on UI/UX attributes: spacing rhythm, typography scale, color palette, component relationships, responsive breakpoints. Output: layout-{id}.json + safe-styles.css + notes.md. Prevents unwanted CSS leakage when copying layouts between projects.
